title: Johnny Staccato (1959) 1-27 guest star George Voskovec
description:
Johnny Staccato (1959) Episode Twenty Seven: " Swinging Longhair"  guest star George Voscovec.  

Fred Katz is featured as one of the musicians.  Fred Katz will be a familair name to fans of Ken Nordine's "Word Jazz" recordings released around this time.

runtime 26 min.

Introducing this series to torrents in a small file size. There is a wiki for this series with many details. In these fileshares I will not repeat a lot of that.

From the wiki

Johnny Staccato is an American private detective series starring John Cassavetes which ran for 27 episodes on NBC from September 10, 1959 through March 24, 1960.

1-27 	"Swinging Long Hair" 	March 17, 1960 	Staccato is mistaken for a concert pianist who has come to the United States to avoid his repressive government.

Thanks to "The Executive" who gave me the idea to add this television series.  Doing the episodes singly provides for a faster download and quicker view.

Please add this series to other indexes and support filesharing by seeding to others.

This series is currently available in a boxed set for purchase at Timeless Media Group.

This is the last and finale of the Johnny Staccato series.  It was created in 1959 when the major stuggle for civil rights of black people was just beginning.  Very few black performers appear in this program about the "jazz detective."  But Cassavetes would go on to star with Sidney Poitier in the David Susskind film "Edge of the City," notable for it's bold interracial themes.

Also I'll summarize the episodes which Cassavetes directed.  I've noted 'directed by' in the naming of these torrents in later episodes.

Here are the five episodes which John Cassavetes directed:
 
Episode   2  "Murder for Credit"


Episode   7  "Evil"


Episode  13  "A Piece of Paradise"

  
Episode  19  "Night of Jeopardy"


Episode  22  "Solomon"
